DOC.brief_title: Study Investigate Safety Pharmacokinetic Characteristics LC28-0126 Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject age 20 45 year screen . Subjects BMI 18.0 ( inclusive ) 27.0 kg/m2 ( exclusive ) ; total body weight 55 kg ( inclusive ) 90 kg ( exclusive ) Participation clinical research study within previous 2 month Regular alcohol consumption > 21 unit per week .
